variants.Description in input context: The K27N mutation increases the structural ﬂuctuation of β strands including the α1 helix.
The R33Q mutation increases the structural ﬂuctuation of β strands including the α1 helix.
The R42P mutation causes a large ﬂuctuation of β4 strand with respect to β5 strand due to the impossibility of forming paired hydrogen bonds of Pro for Arg42 in wild Uld.
The K48A mutation contributes to structural ﬂuctuations.
The V56E mutation restricts the spatial ﬂexibility at the periphery of the short α2 helix by the interactions between the polar atoms of Glu56 and Ser19 residues.
